Address.Address1: 184 Route De Calas, Bouc Bel Air

Description.Text: Suite-Home Aix en Provence is a modern 4-star hotel offering spacious accommodation in Bouc Bel Air, south of Aix en Provence. Highlights include an outdoor swimming pool, sauna, bar and peaceful surroundings. Bouc Bel Air is a small village situated between Marseille, Gardanne and Aix-en-Provence. Regional places of interest include the Basilique Notre Dame De La Garde, Chateau D'if, the Centre Choregraphique National and the Aix-en-Provence old town. Aix TGV train station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Marseille destinations. The hotel occupies a modern low-rise building featuring a large terrace. Facilities include an outdoor swimming pool, sauna and gym. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Suites are spacious and decorated in a modern style. They feature a well-equipped kitchenette with microwave, fridge, dishwasher and ceramic hob. Amenities include a flat-screen satellite TV, DVD player, safe, work desk and en-suite bathroom. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning. Guests can enjoy a range of drinks at the hotel bar. Free parking is possible onsite. The hotel has a 24-hour reception.
